description.para: Only one constructor is defined for this class

detaileddescription.para: This constructor will in-turn call the constructor of the Attribute or WAttribute class of all the device class attributes.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to the device DeviceClass object
If the command sent to the database failed. Click here to read DevFailed exception specification

description.para: Only one desctructor is defined for this class

briefdescription.para: Get Attribute object from its name.

detaileddescription.para: This method returns a reference to the Attribute object with a name passed as parameter. The equality on attribute name is case independant.

simplesect.para: A reference to the Attribute object

parameterdescription.para: If the attribute is not defined. Click here to read DevFailed exception specification

briefdescription.para: Get Attribute object from its index.

detaileddescription.para: This method returns a reference to the Attribute object from the index in the main attribute vector

simplesect.para: A reference to the Attribute object

briefdescription.para: Get Writable Attribute object from its name.

detaileddescription.para: This method returns a reference to the WAttribute object with a name passed as parameter. The equality on attribute name is case independant.

simplesect.para: A reference to the writable attribute object

parameterdescription.para: If the attribute is not defined. Click here to read DevFailed exception specification

briefdescription.para: Get Writable Attribute object from its index.

detaileddescription.para: This method returns a reference to the Writable Attribute object from the index in the main attribute vector

simplesect.para: A reference to the WAttribute object

briefdescription.para: Get Attribute index into the main attribute vector from its name.

detaileddescription.para: This method returns the index in the Attribute vector (stored in the MultiAttribute object) of an attribute with a given name. The name equality is case independant

simplesect.para: The index in the main attributes vector

parameterdescription.para: If the attribute is not found in the vector. Click here to read DevFailed exception specification

briefdescription.para: Get list of attribute with an alarm level defined.

simplesect.para: A vector of long data. Each object is the index in the main attribute vector of attribute with alarm level defined

briefdescription.para: Check alarm for one attribute with a given name.

detaileddescription.para: This method returns a boolean set to true if the attribute with the given name is in alarm condition

simplesect.para: A boolean set to true if the attribute is in alarm

parameterdescription.para: If the attribute does not have any alarm level defined. Click here to read DevFailed exception specification

briefdescription.para: Check alarm for one attribute from its index in the main attributes vector.

detaileddescription.para: This method returns a boolean set to true if the attribute with the given index in the attrobite object vector is in alarm condition

simplesect.para: A boolean set to true if the attribute is in alarm

parameterdescription.para: If the attribute does not have any alarm level defined. Click here to read DevFailed exception specification

briefdescription.para: Check alarm on all attribute(s) with an alarm defined.

detaileddescription.para: This method returns a boolean set to true if one of the attribute with an alarm level defined is in alarm condition.

simplesect.para: A boolean set to true if one attribute is in alarm

parameterdescription.para: If the alarm level are not defined for one of the attribute in the list of alarmable one Click here to read DevFailed exception specification

briefdescription.para: Add alarm message to device status.

detaileddescription.para: This method add alarm mesage to the string passed as parameter. A message is added for each attribute which is in alarm condition

parameterdescription.para: The string (should be the device status)

briefdescription.para: Get the vector of attribute objects.

detaileddescription.para: Returns the vector of attribute objects.
This vector is often referred as the main attributes vector
It is a vector of index in the main attribute vector

briefdescription.para: The list of attribute with an alarm level defined.

detaileddescription.para: It is a vector of index in the main attribute vector

briefdescription.para: There is one instance of this class for each device.

detaileddescription.para: This class is mainly an aggregate of Attribute or WAttribute objects. It eases management of multiple attributes
